abilities.name: Teleport Blade
abilities.description: Deals 100% AD damage. 45% chance to allow another action without ending turn.

abilities.name: Butterfly Trail
abilities.description: Reduces all teammates' and Ayane's active cooldowns by 1 turn. Has 20% chance to reduce by 2 turns instead.

abilities.name: Ready to Slice
abilities.description: Increases Ayane's critical chance by 15% for 3 turns and her physical damage by 10%.

abilities.name: Execute Attack
abilities.description: Deals 250% AD damage. If target is below 30% health, deals 350% AD damage instead.

passive.name: Combat Reflexes
passive.description: After using an ability, Ayane has a 25% chance to reduce all her abilities on cooldown by 1 turn.
